PDS APT Repository

Setup Instructions

Add this repository to your system:

# Add GPG key
curl -fsSL https://{{REPO_OWNER}}.github.io/PDS/pds-repo.gpg | sudo tee /usr/share/keyrings/pds-repo.gpg >/dev/null

# Add repository
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/pds-repo.gpg] https://{{REPO_OWNER}}.github.io/PDS/apt/ stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pds-repo.list

# Update and install
sudo apt update
sudo apt install pds

Repository Contents

This repository contains the PDS (Portable Deploy Suite) package with comprehensive Bash functions for software installation, UI setup, and system deployment.
